channel.title: Sleds (how would i give it the "equip" option?)
channel.description: Title says all, i have sleds in my server but there is no case for them in itemdef at all and they dont have an equip option at all its either use or drop.. how would i go about adding the equip option.. i would try the itemdef class but i dont know the model id for the sled and would that even work???

item.title: Sleds (how would i give it the "equip" option?)
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Simple, you use the other Sled which is usable. There are two. One which you can equip/use and one you cannot.

Psssst, the id is 4084
